title: Icefiend

properties.name: description
properties.value: Icefiends are found on top of the Ice Mountain, near the Dwarven Mine in member worlds. They are also found in the Zamorakian region of the God Wars Dungeon. Killing an icefiend is one of the three options to cool down the Dwarven rock cake in Recipe for Disaster, the other ones being with ice gloves. You can alternatively wait four hours for the Dwarven rock cake to cool in your bank. Icefiends can also be received as a Slayer task.

Icefiends are found on top of the Ice Mountain, near the Dwarven Mine in member worlds. They are also found in the Zamorakian region of the God Wars Dungeon. Killing an icefiend is one of the three options to cool down the Dwarven rock cake in Recipe for Disaster, the other ones being with ice gloves. You can alternatively wait four hours for the Dwarven rock cake to cool in your bank. Icefiends can also be received as a Slayer task.

  1. ↑ The "nothing" drop is removed while wearing a ring of wealth.
  2. ↑ 2.00 2.01 2.02 2.03 2.04 2.05 2.06 2.07 2.08 2.09 2.10 2.11 The drop rate is increased while wearing a ring of wealth due to the "nothing" drop being removed.
  3. ↑ 3.0 3.1 The talisman dropped depends on where the monster is located: monsters above ground level drop the nature talisman, and monsters below ground level drop the chaos talisman.
  4. ↑ 4.0 4.1 4.2 Only dropped if Legends' Quest has been finished; if not, a talisman is dropped instead.

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Looting bag11/8[d 1]Not soldN/A
Ecumenical key11/60–1/40[d 2][d 3]Not sold61,500
Clue scroll (easy)(m)11/128; 1/64[d 5][d 4][1]Not sold12
  1. ↑ Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the Wilderness.
  2. ↑ Ecumenical keys are only dropped in the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.
  3. ↑ Ecumenical key drop rates increase to 1/55, 1/50, 1/45, and 1/40 after completion of the hard, elite, master, and grandmaster Combat Achievements respectively.
  4. ↑ The easy clue scroll drop rate inceases to 1/64 if a Ring of wealth (i) is worn and fought in the Wilderness.
  5. ↑ The easy clue scroll drop rate increases to 1/121; 1/60 with the completion of the easy combat achievements.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 March 2021
(update)

Several monsters, including Icefiend, were tagged as demonic, allowing demonbane weapons to work on them.

8 August 2019
(update)

The drop rate for ecumenical keys have been changed to be 1/60 regardless of keys owned.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Tide's Twitter account. 24 May 2019. (Archived from the original on 24 May 2019.) Mod Tide: "I know its been a while since the clue expansion but here is the information on clue scroll drop rates and loot chances! If anything changes I will keep you posted."

'''Icefiends''' are found on top of the [[Ice Mountain]], near the [[Dwarven Mine]] in member worlds. They are also found in the Zamorakian region of the [[God Wars Dungeon]]. Killing an icefiend is one of the three options to cool down the [[Dwarven rock cake]] in [[Recipe for Disaster]], the other ones being with [[ice gloves]]. You can alternatively wait four hours for the Dwarven rock cake to cool in your bank. Icefiends can also be received as a [[Slayer task]].
